project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file, specifically calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Set up the environment and create a basic Python file structure
Implement functionality to read a CSV file
Implement functionality to prompt the user for numerical columns
Calculate the mean for the specified numerical columns
Calculate the median for the specified numerical columns
Calculate the mode for the specified numerical columns
Display the calculated mean, median, and mode to the user
Write tests for the functionality implemented above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure they work correctly
